did.head: DESCRIPTIVE SUMMARY
did.repository: Kheel Center for Labor-Management Documentation and Archives, Cornell University Library
did.abstract: Largely western United States railroad prints and lantern slides. Lantern slides labeled as if for court exhibits.

accessrestrict.head: Access Restrictions:
accessrestrict.p: Access to the collections in the Kheel Center is restricted. Please contact a reference archivist for access to these materials.

userestrict.head: Restrictions on Use:
userestrict.p: This collection must be used in keeping with the Kheel Center Information Sheet and Procedures for Document Use.

prefercite.head: Cite As:
prefercite.p: Railroad Collection Photographs #6040 P. Kheel Center for Labor-Management Documentation and Archives, Cornell University Library.

relatedmaterial.head: RELATED MATERIALS
relatedmaterial.p:
Related Collections:

5148 P: Order of Railway Conductors and Brakemen Photographs

5182 P: Brotherhood of Railroad Signalmen of America Photographs
5563 P: Railroad Photographs
6215 P: Neil P. Spiers Collection of U.S. Railroad Retirement Board Member Photographs
6268 P: Joint Committee of Adjustment for the Rock Island System's Order of Railway Conductors and Brotherhood of Railroad Trainmen Photograph
6312 P: Judith Sullivan Kowalczyk Collection of Brotherhood of Railroad Trainmen Photographs
6312 PUBS: Judith Sullivan Kowalczyk Collection of Brotherhood of Railroad Trainmen Publications
6321 P: Chairman Aubrey L. Miller Collection of A. T. & S. F. Railway General Grievance Committee Photographs

scopecontent.p: 26 slides -- EMD Locomotive Photos ; EMD-Colored Drawings of Locomotives
26 slides -- EMD-Trucks ; EMD-Axles-Gears-& Bearings ; EMD-Traction Motors ; EMD-Electrical
3 photographs -- Sam Phillips ; Carl Goff ; Walter E. Jones

did.unittitle: Brotherhood Locomotive Firemen, Second Annual Convention ; Washington Delegation, Denver 1916

scopecontent.p: 7 photographs -- Brotherhood of Railroad Signalmen of America, General Chairman's Meeting, March 18-19, 1960 ; General Chairman's Meeting, August 9-10, 1957 ; General Chairman's Meeting, August 15-16, 1953 ; Golden Anniv., August 18-22, 1952 ; General Chairman's Meeting, August 18-19, 1951 ; Testimonial Dinner in Honor of Mr. George N. Butler, Jan. 29, 1957 ; Convention of the Ladies Auxiliary to the Switchmen's Union of N.A., June 9-16, 1947

did.unittitle: Conference Railway Labor Executives, Conductors Division, Washington, D.C. March, 1934 ; James L. Karney photo ; 33rd Conv. B. of R.T., Hollywood Fla. - Sept. 1968 ; Texas Del. B. of R.T., Hollywood, Fla. - Sept. 1968 ; 33rd Conv. B. of R.T., Hollywood,

Panoramic photos -- Conference Railway Labor Executives, Conductors Division, Washington, D.C. March, 1934 ; 1 photo sorted from the 'misc. photos' box that had been stored above the mapcase ; James L. Karney photo ; 33rd Conv. B. of R.T., Hollywood Fla.
